label: A_tP12_138_bi-001
title: C (T12 Group IV) Structure
comments: This is a tetragonal allotrope of the diamond structure found computationally in C, Si, and Ge. The authors state ``the T12 polymorph naturally accounts for the experimental $d$ spacings and Raman spectra of synthesized metastable Ge and Si-XIII phases with long-puzzling unknown structures, respectively.''
